检测服务器MSPT并发送数据┃ 简介此插件可以提供管理员或玩家服务器的MSPT(一游戏刻有多少毫秒)十分轻量,只有11KB支持在物品栏稍上方的位置上显示没有配置文件
┃ 用法/tickmonitor 然后按TAB补全可以看到插件的选项 →/tm disable 隐藏 →/tm enable 显示 →/tm getlatest 聊天栏展示一次 →/tm monitor 在活动栏显示 →/tm reset 重置选项/tm 和/mspt 是简略指令

┃ 使用APIThe API fires the event "MonitoringCycleCompleteEvent"Event cannot be cancelledIt passes the time frame that has elapsed (enum Timeframe) and a set of doubles that are the observed milliseconds per tick for the event's timeframeevent.getTimeframe() -> MonitoringCycleCompleteEvent.Timeframeevent.getData() -> List<Double>

┃ 兼容性本插件为1.14-1.15而且用于PaperSpigot可能对于以下版本也适用,如果你想的话请测试并发报告给我(作者)
┃ 杂记作者捐赠链接作者Github源代码链接如何读懂数据:游戏正常情况下每秒钟(s)有20游戏刻(tick),这是游戏在服务器运行的基本属性一秒又包含了1000毫秒(ms)1000毫秒(ms) ÷ 20游戏刻(tick) = 50ms因此,如果你的MSPT超过50,你服务器就缺少TPS了,每秒钟的游戏刻会减少效果就是游戏变慢,如果是10游戏刻的服务器,农作物就会半速生长MSPT越低,服务器越好Are you a sucker for bringing your server to peak performance, but /tps isn't quite accurate enough for you?
Then hot damn, use jaylawl's TickMonitor plugin for paper spigot based servers! >>> Spigot Link <<<

TickMonitor allows you to monitor your server's MSPT (milliseconds per tick) - which is helpful for finding processes that take up lots of CPU power. Rule of thumb: if your MSPT are below 50 ms, your server should run on *20.00 TPS!
